function.description: Calculate the remainder of a decimal number divided by an integer.
function.name: get_decimal_remainder

decimal_number.description: The decimal number to find the remainder of.

divisor.description: The divisor to calculate the remainder.

function.description: Convert a repeating decimal to a simplified fraction and calculate a + b.
function.name: process_repeating_decimal

repeating_decimal.description: The repeating decimal as a string (e.g., '0.42')

function.description: Convert a decimal or repeating decimal to a fraction.
function.name: decimal_to_fraction

decimal.description: The decimal as a string, it can be repeating like '0.42'.

function.description: Calculate the sum of distinct remainders when squaring integers in a range.
function.name: find_distinct_remainders_sum

modulus.description: The modulus to compute the remainders against.

function.description: Calculate the modular inverse of a number modulo another number using the Extended Euclidean Algorithm.
function.name: calculate_modular_inverse

a.description: The number to find the modular inverse for.

function.description: Convert a given decimal number to a specified base.
function.name: convert_decimal_to_base

function.description: Convert a repeating decimal string to a fraction and return a + b.
function.name: convert_repeating_decimal_to_fraction

repeating_decimal.description: The repeating decimal as a string (e.g., '0.42')
